Instance.description: A posture that enforces rules concerning part use and adjacency.

Tunable.name: _has_opposite_mirrored_targets
Tunable.description: If checked, assume that the animation content of x and y is mirrored relative to one another. For instance, if x is targeting a part that is un-mirrored, assume that y should target a mirrored part. An example of when this should be checked is the bed woohoo posture, where the left and right side of the bed (and by extension x and y's target parts) are mirrors of each other. Conversely, it should be unchecked for pillow fight, where both sims target parts on the same side of the bed (one at the head and one at the foot).

Tunable.name: _targets_same_part
Tunable.description: If this is checked, then two Sims target the same part.
